entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Moose Jaw
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:32 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Moose Jaw 8:00 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023
Temperature: -11.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -12.8°C
Wind: NNE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Fog. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Fog developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Fog dissipating. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating late in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h overnight. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023
